programmes.show_description: 4/12. The candidates must create a TV ad and a social media campaign for bottled water.

It's an emotional reunion for the new owner of a Staffordshire house.
11/15. The British people are proud of their beef dishes, and the French are too. Steak frites is a national institution, but in Provence, Marcus is expecting something a little different.
12/15. Herbes de Provence is famous. But with no UK equivalent, Marcus wants to create his own simple dried herb mix to rival this French classic and turn any dull dish into a tasty meal.

1/12. Lucy and Adam's big move to their dream farm in Scotland hangs in the balance.

3/4. Monty looks back at some of the remarkable gardeners shining a light on how people can grow their own nutritious food fresh from the garden.
